model

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Reservation>

    public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Reservation>
    This class contains information about a reservation. It contains two Date objects as well as a Customer object and a Vehicle object. The purpose of this class is to contain all information about a reservation.
    Author:
    tbrj

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Reservation r)
        Compares startdate to the stardate of Reservation r. Returns 1,0 or-1 if the startdate is less, even or more.
        Specified by:
